Focuses the specified element selector or container ID or the default container. If
Spotlight is in pointer mode, focus is not changed but

will be set as the last
focused element of its spotlight containers.

tags.title: param
tags.description:
Element selector or the container ID.
If not supplied, the default container will be focused.
tags.name: elem

tags.title: returns
tags.description: `true` if focus successful, `false` if not.

children.value:
Element selector or the container ID.
If not supplied, the default container will be focused.

Moves focus to the next spottable control in the direction specified. Optionally, a source
element selector may be supplied as the starting point.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Direction to move, one of `'left'`, `'right'`, `'up'` or `'down'`
tags.name: direction

tags.title: param
tags.description:
If supplied, the element to move from. If not supplied,
the currently focused item will be used.
tags.name: selector

tags.title: returns
tags.description: `true` if focus successful, `false` if not.
